item.title: Chicken tikka masala
item.description: Foreword This is the Recepie i use to make Chicken tikka masala. as always, keep in mind i go alot by feeling! adjust it to your liking. Tip if you want to make this, marinate the chicken for a day for the best result! or at least a couple of hours Shopping list!
